bastille_face.description: The right of the sonogram is Bastille's face, looking directly at you.  The left side is the chest.  The hollow area is the heart, I believe.  On the live sonogram you can see the heart beating, very fast.
bastille_face.title: Bastille Face

bastille_legs.description: The middle of the sonogram is Bastille's knees and shins and feet.  The left side is his belly and one elbow.
bastille_legs.title: Bastille Legs

bastille_mom.description: This is Bastille's mom, in Alamo Square.  This row of "painted lady" Victorian houses and the downtown skyline is one of the most photographed scenes in San Francisco.
bastille_mom.title: Bastille Mom

evan1.description: Felix chaperones Evan from our car (in background) to their nanny Sylvie's.   These guys really, really enjoy hanging out together.
evan1.title: Evan 1

impetigo.description:
The cherry trees in front of our house are blooming.

See the boo-boos on Felix's eye and chin? That's impetigo, a skin infection. It started as a little scrape on his chin, got worse, and spread. Felix is now taking antibiotics and it's going away. We spent the week-end wondering if people were wondering if we beat the poor child.
impetigo.title: Impetigo

nounours1.description: Nounours is a member of the family.  He's brought on most of our outings.  Here he's at brunch.
nounours1.title: Nounours 1

train1.description: The miniature steam train in the hills above Berkeley.  The conductor's dog leads the way.
train1.title: Train 1

description:
We're pregnant. Lucie's in her second trimester. The baby is due around July 17th.

We don't have a name yet. The code name for the project is "Bastille", because we originally thought the due date was July 14th, Bastille Day.

Bastille is a boy. We found this out at the sonogram checkup yesterday. He has the right numbers of fingers and toes, and his little heart is beating like a champ.

Felix has some hazy notion of what's going on. When we ask "where's the baby?" he knows the correct answer is to point at mom's belly. He always says "yes" when we ask him if he wants a baby in the house. Which is also the correct answer.

Lucie is already starting to move in that majestic, belly-first stroll.
title: February 18
